author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: تا رسيد به اين امر بديع منيع.  و اکثر از منجّمان خبر ظهور نجم را در سماء ظاهره دادهاند.  و همچنين در ارض هم نورين نيّرين، احمدو کاظم، قدّس اللّه تربتهما.
translation: And now concerning this wondrous and most exalted Cause. Know thou verily that many an astronomer hath announced the appearance of its star in the visible heaven. Likewise, there appeared on earth Ahmad and Kázim, those twin resplendent lights—may God sanctify their resting-place!
